mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees (employee_id, password, name, birth, resident_registration_number, phone, email, address, detailed_address, hire_date, status, department_id, position_id, remaining_leave, last_modified, modified_by) VALUES (#{employeeId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{birth}, #{residentRegistrationNumber}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{address}, #{detailedAddress}, #{hireDate}, #{status}, #{department}, #{position}, #{remainingLeave}, #{lastModified}, #{modifiedBy})
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET name=#{name}, password=#{password}, birth=#{birth}, resident_registration_number=#{residentRegistrationNumber}, phone=#{phone}, email=#{email}, address=#{address}, detailed_address=#{detailedAddress}, hire_date=#{hireDate}, status=#{status}, department_id=#{department}, position_id=#{position}, remaining_leave=#{remainingLeave}, last_modified=#{lastModified}, modified_by=#{modifiedBy} WHERE employee_id=#{employeeId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE YEAR(hire_date) = YEAR(CURDATE())
SELECT e.*, r.resignation_date FROM employees e LEFT JOIN resignation r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id WHERE e.status = '퇴사' AND r.resignation_date >= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 2 MONTH);
SELECT e.*, r.resignation_date FROM employees e LEFT JOIN resignation r ON e.employee_id = r.employee_id WHERE e.status = '퇴사' AND r.resignation_date <= DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 MONTH);
